channel.title: Quora 热门回答
channel.description: 用中文浏览Quora上的热门回答

item.title: What is your best managing advice for running an engineering department? Answer by Raghavendra Prabhu (@omrvp), Head of Eng & Research @CovariantAI. https://t.co/vs9rXPS0S2 https://t.co/aFptxs0mzq
